name: Ninkyo Dantai
storyline: Embark on an exciting journey as Shinji, a former street racer who has been given a second chance at redemption. Sent to the picturesque Japanese town of Buruwasu to escape his criminal past, he finds himself embroiled in a mystery when he stumbles upon a protest over an unsolved murder. Using your sharp investigative skills, gather evidence and build a case to bring justice to the troubled city and restore order to the once peaceful streets of Buruwasu.
summary: Ninkyo Dantai is a 3D top-down, role-playing video game developed by TeamCS1. It is the first mainline title in the Ninkyo Dantai franchise developed as a turn-based RPG.
